description.zh-cn: 中国已退役职业网球运动员。
description.en: Retired Chinese professional tennis player.

description.zh-cn: 彭帅的出生地。
description.en: Birthplace of Peng Shuai.

description.zh-cn: 台湾网球运动员，彭帅的双打搭档，被称为“海峡组合”。
description.en: Taiwanese tennis player, Peng Shuai's doubles partner, known as the 'Cross-Strait Combination'.

zh-cn: 国家体育总局网球中心
en: General Administration of Sport of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家体育事务主管机构。
description.en: The government agency responsible for sports in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 彭帅的母亲。
description.en: Peng Shuai's mother.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Former member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and Vice Premier of the State Council of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 张高丽的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Zhang Gaoli.

nodes.id: 彭帅指控张高丽性丑闻事件

zh-cn: 彭帅指控张高丽性丑闻事件

description.zh-cn: 彭帅在微博发文指控前中国国务院副总理张高丽性侵的事件。
description.en: The event where Peng Shuai accused former Chinese Vice Premier Zhang Gaoli of sexual assault in a Weibo post.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆的反性骚扰和性侵犯运动。
description.en: The anti-sexual harassment and sexual assault movement in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 旨在关注彭帅人身安全的国际社交媒体运动。
description.en: An international social media movement aimed at raising concern for Peng Shuai's personal safety.

description.zh-cn: 国际女子职业网球的管理组织。
description.en: The governing body of women's professional tennis.

description.zh-cn: 负责组织夏季和冬季奥林匹克运动会的国际体育组织。
description.en: An international sports organization responsible for organizing the Summer and Winter Olympic Games.

description.zh-cn: 国际奥林匹克委员会主席。
description.en: President of the International Olympic Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国国家体育总局网球运动管理中心党委书记、中国奥委会副主席。
description.en: Party Secretary of the Tennis Administrative Center of the General Administration of Sport of China and Vice President of the Chinese Olympic Committee.

nodes.id: 2016年夏季奥林匹克运动会中国代表团

zh-cn: 2016年夏季奥林匹克运动会中国代表团

description.zh-cn: 中国网球运动员。
description.en: Chinese tennis player.

description.zh-cn: 双打搭档，被称为“海峡组合”，曾共同赢得温网和法网女双冠军。
description.en: Doubles partner, known as the 'Cross-Strait Combination', won Wimbledon and French Open women's doubles titles together.

description.zh-cn: 因训练计划、参赛奖金等问题产生矛盾。
description.en: Had conflicts over issues such as training plans and prize money.

description.zh-cn: 彭帅称与张高丽曾维持长达10多年的婚外情和不伦恋关系。
description.en: Peng Shuai claimed to have had an extramarital affair and an intermittent relationship with Zhang Gaoli for over 10 years.

description.zh-cn: 彭帅在微博发文，指控张高丽强迫其发生性关系并始乱终弃。
description.en: Peng Shuai posted on Weibo, accusing Zhang Gaoli of forcing her into a sexual relationship and then abandoning her.

relationships.source: 彭帅指控张高丽性丑闻事件

description.zh-cn: 彭帅在指控后与外界失联，引发国际社会发起了“#彭帅在哪里”运动以关注其人身安全。
description.en: After making the allegation, Peng Shuai lost contact with the outside world, prompting the international community to launch the '#WhereIsPengShuai' movement to express concern for her safety.

description.zh-cn: 该运动引起了国际女子网球协会的公开关注和行动。
description.en: The movement prompted public concern and action from the Women's Tennis Association.

description.zh-cn: 因对彭帅事件的处理方式感到担忧，宣布暂停所有在中国举办的赛事。
description.en: Announced the suspension of all tournaments in China due to concerns over the handling of the Peng Shuai situation.

description.zh-cn: 与彭帅进行视频通话，以确认其安全。
description.en: Held a video call with Peng Shuai to confirm her safety.

description.zh-cn: 国际奥委会主席托马斯·巴赫等人与彭帅进行视频通话。
description.en: IOC President Thomas Bach and others held a video call with Peng Shuai.

description.zh-cn: 陪同彭帅与国际奥委会主席进行视频通话。
description.en: Accompanied Peng Shuai during her video call with the IOC President.

relationships.target: 彭帅指控张高丽性丑闻事件

description.zh-cn: 彭帅的指控被视为中国#MeToo运动的一部分，并且是首次触及最高层级的政治人物。
description.en: Peng Shuai's allegation is considered part of the #MeToo movement in China and the first to involve a top-level political figure.

relationships.target: 2016年夏季奥林匹克运动会中国代表团

description.zh-cn: 代表中国队参加2016年夏季奥林匹克运动会。
description.en: Represented China at the 2016 Summer Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 2016年夏季奥林匹克运动会女子双打搭档。
description.en: Women's doubles partner at the 2016 Summer Olympics.
